title: Is the VITEEE question paper based only on class XII? - Quora
tags: Vellore Institute of Technology Engineering Entrance Examination (VITEEE)

response.answer_text: Few Tips to Crack VITEEE1. VITEEE checks and select students on the basis of concept, speed, accuracy, time management and decision making power. So very first thing is make a plan What to Do and Don’ts.2. Make a proper time table to check your level of preparation as per prescribed syllabus. You can check topic covered under VITEEE Syllabus from Syllabus for VITEEE for Engineering and Eligibility Criteria3. Follow the given order to attempt paper. (It’s Just a suggestion)- First: ChemistrySecond: PhysicsThird: Maths4. VITEEE paper has no negative marking thus try to attempt as many as question but keeping the factor of time management in mind.5. Sample papers are the best source to judge the level of preparation you have done. So, try to take help from previous year papers and sample papers for better preparations.6. Last and the most important thing is you need to get updated with the news regarding the entrance exam.Now lets discuss topic that required more concentration as compared to other topics.Topics under PhysicsElectrostatics, Current Electricity, Effects of Electric Current, Electromagnetic Induction and semiconductor devices. You need to focus more on these topics as most of the question will from these topics.Topics under ChemistryAtomic Structure, Electrochemistry, Biomolecules, Organic Nitrogen Compounds, Alcohols and Ethers. NCERT is the best source for In organic preparation thus you can refer this.Topics under MathsVector Algebra, Analytical Geometry of Three Dimensions, Integral Calculus and its Applications are the tough topic thus give proper emphasis on them.I hope these Tips to Crack VITEEE will help you to reduce worries up to some extent. Best of Luck for your exam..!!!
Yes most of the syllabus for VIT entrance is nearly same as XII of Cbse board but some topics can be from X and XI also.
